TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi AssemblyInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供取得應用程式相關資訊的屬性，例如版本號碼、描述、已載入組件等。

span.span: Provides properties for getting the information about the application, such as the version number, description, loaded assemblies, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分屬性所公開`My.Application.Info`物件傳回應用程式的組件資訊。Some of the properties exposed by the `My.Application.Info` object return the application's assembly information. 若要設定應用程式的組件中的資訊，您必須使用**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**.To set the information in the application's assembly, you must use the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**. `My.Application.Info`物件會提供類似的功能類別，但範圍的最常見內容以便快速存取。The `My.Application.Info` object provides functionality similar to the class but is scoped to give quick access to the most common properties. 其他屬性，例如`LoadedAssemblies`，提供應用程式的目前狀態存取。Other properties, such as `LoadedAssemblies`, provide access to the current state of the application. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Version`屬性來顯示應用程式的版本。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Reflection.Assembly currentAssembly) cil managed

param.name: currentAssembly
param.span: 要為其取得資訊的組件。

span.span: The assembly for which to obtain the information.

summary.span: 使用指定的組件資訊，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified assembly information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssemblyName As String
public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得應用程式之組件檔案的名稱 (不包括副檔名)。

span.span: Gets the name, without the extension, of the assembly file for the application.
A containing the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`屬性會取得包含資訊清單的檔案名稱。The `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property gets the name of the file containing the manifest. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`屬性來顯示應用程式的名稱。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property to display the name of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

permission.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompanyName As String
public: property System::String ^ CompanyName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與應用程式關聯的公司名稱。

span.span: Gets the company name associated with the application.

value.span: ，包含與應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。

span.span: A that contains the company name associated with the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.CompanyName`屬性會取得與應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。The `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property gets the company name associated with the application. 您可以變更的值來變更公司名稱**公司**中**組件資訊**對話方塊中，從存取**應用程式**窗格**專案設計工具**。You can change the company name by changing the value for **Company** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.CompanyName`屬性來顯示應用程式相關聯的公司名稱。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property to display the company name associated with the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#21)]

span.span: The assembly does not have an attribute.

span.span: Gets a collection of all assemblies loaded by the application.

value.span: 的 ，包含應用程式所載入之所有組件的集合。

span.span: A of containing all the assemblies loaded by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies`屬性是類似於方法。The `My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies` property is similar to the method. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies`屬性來顯示組件載入應用程式。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.LoadedAssemblies` property to display the assemblies loaded by the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#25)] 這個範例需要 Windows Form 應用程式沒有控制項，名為`ListBox1`。This example requires that your Windows Forms application has a control named `ListBox1`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StackTrace As String
public: property System::String ^ StackTrace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: Gets the current stack-trace information.
A containing the current stack-trace information.
The return value can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.StackTrace`屬性會列出依反向時間順序的方法呼叫 — 也就是第一次，它會描述最新的方法呼叫，並列出每個方法呼叫，在不同行堆疊上的。The `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property lists method calls in reverse chronological order—that is, it describes the most recent method call first, and it lists each method call on the stack on a separate line. 不過，`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`屬性可能不會報告為多個方法呼叫，如預期般，因為發生在最佳化期間的程式碼轉換。However, the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property might not report as many method calls as expected, due to code transformations that occur during optimization. 一般而言，堆疊追蹤資訊會用於偵錯應用程式。Typically, the stack-trace information is used for debugging applications. 每個方法呼叫的堆疊追蹤資訊的格式如下：The stack-trace information for each method call is formatted as follows: 「 在*FullClassName*。*MethodName*(*MethodParams*) 中*FileName*： 列*LineNumber* ""at *FullClassName*.*MethodName*(*MethodParams*) in *FileName*:line *LineNumber* " 常值"at"前方會有三個空格，而 「 中 」 的常值和 「: 列 」 無法偵錯符號時，會省略。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the literals "in" and ":line" are omitted if debug symbols are not available. 預留位置`FullClassName`， `MethodName`， `MethodParams`， `FileName`，和`LineNumber`會取代實際的值，定義如下：The placeholders `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber` are replaced by actual values, defined as follows: |組件Part|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |*FullClassName**FullClassName*|類別，包括命名空間的完整名稱。The full name of the class, including the namespace.| |*MethodName**MethodName*|方法的名稱。The name of the method.| |*MethodParams**MethodParams*|參數類型/名稱組的清單。The list of parameter type/name pairs. 以逗號 （，） 區隔每個配對。Each pair is separated by a comma (,). 如果，則會忽略這項資訊*MethodName*採用零參數。This information is omitted if *MethodName* takes zero parameters.| |*FileName**FileName*|檔案的來源名稱*MethodName*方法宣告。The name of the source file where the *MethodName* method is declared. 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.| |*LineNumber**LineNumber*|在行號*FileName* ，其中包含從原始程式碼*MethodName*呼叫堆疊上的指示。The number of the line in *FileName* that contains the source code from *MethodName* for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.| `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性。The `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`屬性來顯示應用程式從點執行的程式碼的堆疊追蹤。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property to display the stack trace of the application from the point at which the code executes. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#27)]

exception.span: 要求的堆疊追蹤資訊超出範圍。

span.span: The requested stack-trace information is out of range.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkingSet As Long
public: property long WorkingSet { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得對應至處理程序內容的實體記憶體數量。

span.span: Gets the amount of physical memory mapped to the process context.

value.span: ，包含對應至處理序內容之實體記憶體的位元組數目。

span.span: A containing the number of bytes of physical memory mapped to the process context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet`屬性具有相同的行為屬性。The `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet` property has the same behavior as the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性永遠會傳回零 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition。This property always returns zero for Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.WorkingSet`屬性來顯示對應至應用程式的實體記憶體的位元組數目。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.WorkingSet` property to display the number of bytes of physical memory mapped to the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#31)]

exception.span: 發生部分信任以及使用者缺少必要權限的狀況。

span.span: A situation in which partial trust exists and the user lacks necessary permissions.

permission.span: 控制存取所有環境變數的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access all environment variables.
Associated enumeration: .
